column4: Help with Flash Plugin 1.Using Ub8.04 2.Plugin freezes sometimes when loading a page containing a flash video, freezes for 10 to 20 seconds, unfreezes and plays (sometimes) 3. What to do thanks!
It didnt do this before (about 2 days ago it was fine)
did you uninstall flash and install the nonfree version through synaptic, that usually fixes things

yes I uninstalled thru synaptic (complete removal) then reinstalled. Flash works now, but when it loads it freezes the browser for a few seconds, that didnt happen before, it just loaded immediately the video
